name: Lumi (Pierrot Tournier, PaulBzs, CosmoSun, Aurélie Roux, Aullwen)
name_original: Lumi (Pierrot Tournier, PaulBzs, CosmoSun, Aurélie Roux, Aullwen)
description:
Welcome to Lumi !

In this Platformer/Adventure game, you will take control of Lumi, a small flaming soul, possessing the remains of a dead adventurer. Together, make your way to the end, to escape from your unliving condition, and face the creatures that haunt these caves.

Controls (we advise you to use a controller, if you don't have one or prefer to play with Keyboard & Mouse, that's alright, we got it covered ^^ ).

Controller : 

Left Joystick (move),
A/X (Jump), 
X/Square (Attack),
RB/R1 (Launch Lumi),
B/Circle (Dash),
LB/L1 (Call Lumi Back).

Keyboard & Mouse : 

Q/D (left/right), 
Space (Jump),
Left Click (Attack)
Right Click (Launch Lumi),
E (Dash),
F (Call Lumi Back).

This game is a submission to the 2021.1 Brackeys Game Jam, which theme was 'stronger together'.

All credits goes to : Pierrot Tournier, Aurélie Roux, Paul Beziers, Titouan Porteau, Sunny Pautrat.

" Hey Guys ! 

Quick comment to say that, in the rush of publishing the game, we forgot to disable Dashing and Double Jumping at the start.

If you want to experience the game as it was designed originally, we advise you NOT to use those abilities until you unlock them the proper way

Otherwise, if you're in for a quick test, then have fun messing around at full power, right from the start ^^ "
